# Shadow Warriors (film)

}}Shadow Warriors' is a 1995 American science fiction film starring Terry O'Quinn directed by Lamar Card.
Premise
A scientist needs human corpses to produce enhanced cyborgs.
Cast
*Terry O'Quinn
*Timothy Patrick Cavanaugh
*Evan Lurie
*Ashley Graham
*Russ Tertyask
*Steve O'Hara
*Brian Price
Reception
According to TV Guide it was "a poor man's Terminator... a slick predictable action flick."
References
External links
